derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'cause joy to'): from Old French rejoiss-, lengthened stem of rejoir, from re- (expressing intensive force) + joir 'experience joy'

entry.def: If you rejoice, you are very pleased about something and you show it in your behaviour.

example.ex: Garbo plays the Queen, rejoicing in the love she has found with Antonio...
example.tran: 嘉宝饰演王后，陶醉于和安东尼奥的热恋中。

example.ex: A Foreign Ministry statement said that the French government rejoiced at the happy outcome to events...
example.tran: 外交部的声明称法国政府很高兴看到事件得到圆满解决。

entry.def: If you say that a person or thing rejoices in the name of something, you mean that they have a silly or amusing name.

example.ex: ...their tortoise, who rejoiced in the name of Carruthers.
example.tran: 他们养的龟有个搞笑的名字——卡拉瑟斯

auth_sentence.content: Rejoice That yet a remnant of your race survives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rejoice That yet a remnant of your race survives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rejoice That yet a remnant of your race survives.

auth_sentence.content: They want you to rejoice and be glad in it.
auth_sentence.res_content: They want you to rejoice and be glad in it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They want you to rejoice and be glad in it.

auth_sentence.content: They wanted to rejoice with the miners and their families.
auth_sentence.res_content: They wanted to rejoice with the miners and their families.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They wanted to rejoice with the miners and their families.

means.word_mean: (使)欣喜[高兴, 快乐]；非常高兴；深感欣喜

sentences.en: But they have rejoiced too soon.
sentences.cn: 但是他们高兴得太早了。

sentences.en: When the good news reached there, the whole county rejoiced.
sentences.cn: 喜讯传到那里时, 全县的人都欢欣鼓舞起来。

sentences.en: Let us rejoice together on this great occasion!
sentences.cn: 在这样一个盛大的节日里, 让我们共同欢庆吧！

sentences.en: I rejoice to see you here.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴能在这儿见到你。

sentences.en: They all rejoiced to hear of your success.
sentences.cn: 听说了你们的成就, 他们全都很高兴。

sentences.en: I rejoice that you have recovered so quickly.
sentences.cn: 听到你已很快痊愈了, 我很高兴。

sentences.en: He rejoiced that all the work was after all finished in time.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴, 全部的工作最终还是按时完成了。

sentences.en: The boy's success rejoiced his mother's heart.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩的成功使他母亲心里充满喜悦。

sentences.en: The news of victory rejoiced the heart of the whole nation.
sentences.cn: 胜利的喜悦使全国人民欢欣鼓舞。

jushi.english: But they have rejoiced too soon.
jushi.chinese: 但是他们高兴得太早了。

jushi.english: The people rejoiced when they heard that a young prince was born.
jushi.chinese: 当人们听说一个小王子降生人世时都欢欣鼓舞。

jushi.english: When the good news reached there, the whole county rejoiced.
jushi.chinese: 喜讯传到那儿,全县的人都欢欣鼓舞。
